author: Matthew Lloyd
comment: Worked for about 5 seconds than stopped responding to taps. Tried a few times. Than killed the battery. Moto 360. Good potential though.

author: Michael W
comment: The cannon just goes back and forth and it should go wherever you tap it. It's hard enough playing on a small screen let alone being handicapped by constantly moving gun. You should be able to tap the screen where you want to shoot and that should be that.
title: Should be able to control that cannon
